column4: Microsoft expands program for women returning to work
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp  is expanding a program designed to increase its hiring of women seeking to rejoin the workforce  following a rash of complaints about sexual harassment and gender discrimination at the world's largest software company.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft expands program for women returning to work
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  June 5 Microsoft Corp is expanding a program designed to increase its hiring of women seeking to rejoin the workforce  following a rash of complaints about sexual harassment and gender discrimination at the world's largest software company.

column4: CORRECTED-Microsoft expands program for women returning to work
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  June 5 Microsoft Corp is stepping up its hiring of women seeking to rejoin the workforce  following a rash of complaints about sexual harassment and gender discrimination at the world's largest software company.

column4: Tesla shares rise as Musk says Model 3 set to hit target
column5: Tesla Inc  shares headed for their best day in more than two years on Wednesday after Chief Executive Elon Musk said the car maker was now churning out 500 of its Model 3 sedans a day and should achieve its 5 000 per week target by the end of June. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla shares rise as Musk says Model 3 set to hit target
column5: June 6 Tesla Inc shares headed for their best day in more than two years on Wednesday after Chief Executive Elon Musk said the car maker was now churning out 500 of its Model 3 sedans a day and should achieve its 5 000 per week target by the end of June.

column4: US STOCKS-Banks lift S&P; Tesla drives Nasdaq to record high
column5: * Indexes up: Dow 0.80 pct  S&P 0.38 pct  Nasdaq 0.23 pct (Changes comment  adds details  updates prices)

column4: US STOCKS-Tech stocks mixed after recent surge; banks lift S&P  Dow
column5: * Indexes: Dow up 0.35 pct  S&P up 0.04 pct  Nasdaq off 0.15 pct (Updates to open)

column4: GM to expand driver assistance feature to all Cadillacs in 2020
column5: General Motors Co said on Wednesday it will expand the roll-out of its driver assistance feature Super Cruise to all its Cadillac models beginning 2020.

column4: GM to expand driver assistance feature to all Cadillacs in 2020
column5: June 6 General Motors Co said on Wednesday it will expand the roll-out of its driver assistance feature Super Cruise to all its Cadillac models beginning 2020.

column4: Tesla shares rise as Musk says Model 3 set to hit target
column5: June 6 Tesla Inc shares rose 3.5 percent on Wednesday morning after Chief Executive Elon Musk said the car maker was now churning out 500 of its Model 3 sedans a day and should achieve its 5 000 per week target by the end of June.

column4: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens higher  Nasdaq ticks to another record
column5: June 6 U.S. stock indexes opened higher on Wednesday  with electric carmaker Tesla and insurer United Health among the biggest drivers  while the tech-heavy Nasdaq inched to another record high.

column4: World's top wealth fund opposed Musk's double role at Tesla
column5: OSLO Norway's $1 trillion wealth fund said on Wednesday it had backed an initiative to wrest the role of chairman away from Tesla  Chief Executive Elon Musk.

column4: REFILE-World's top wealth fund opposed Musk's double role at Tesla
column5: OSLO  June 6 Norway's $1 trillion wealth fund said on Wednesday it had backed an initiative to wrest the role of chairman away from Tesla Chief Executive Elon Musk.
